forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some rain or snow showers this morning. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this morning. Then becoming mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low near 30F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow during the morning will give way to snow showers during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low around 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 9F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 19F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 13F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
